name: Facebook Trending Ticker Hider
description: Annoyed by Facebook's new "Trending Topics" ticker that has no relevance to your life whatsoever? Simply hide it and never see it again! Also hides "Sponsored" links on the sidebar! Available on Github: http://github.com/thinkaliker/scripts

user.name: thinkaliker
